interactables.label: Strange Shoes
interactables.examineText: Muddy shoes. They look too large for anyone in your family.

interactables.label: Mail
interactables.examineText: Bills, flyers, and... a letter from Grandmother.

interactables.label: Photo
interactables.examineText: A family portrait. Why is your face scratched out?
interactables.examineTextLowSanity: They are all looking at you. Why are they looking at you?

navigation.label: To Hallway
navigation.lockedText: I shouldn't leave until I check the mail.
